help.desc: Describes a command and how to use it.

addRole.desc: Adds a role to the list of user-assignable roles.

getRoles.desc: Get the list of user-assignable roles.

removeRole.desc: Removes a role from the list of user-assignable roles.

meme.desc: Sends some of June's favorite memes.

error.admin: i dont think youre allowed to do that
error.dm: cant do this in the DMs, ask me in a server
error.not_found: sorry i dont know that command
error.role: i couldnt find that role sorry
